name: Musical Trip
description:
Welcome to the Musical trip!

After having lots of acid and listen too music,you have finally freaked out and taking a trip into this musical world!But those musical notes are fighting back!With some artillery for backup!

Shoot with you music player to fight back!SURVIVE!FREAKY!TOO SCARED?!THIS GAME IS FOR THE BEST!

Move With 'A' and 'D' Buttons and shoot with left mouse.

A video of this game will come soon.

If you are seeing this and not downloading,that means you are scared!So prove yourself!

USE HEADPHONES FOR THE BEST PLAY.

Thanks to Alexander James for the colorful background thingy.
